pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simple Multivariate Statistical Estimation and Tests // A collection of simple parameter estimation and tests for the comparison of multivariate means and variation, to accompany Chapters 4 and 5 of the book Multivariate Statistical Methods. A Primer (5th edition), by Manly BFJ, Navarro Alberto JA Gerow K (2024) doi:10.1201/9781003453482.
